article_title: Hazardous roads could delay CJ delivery
article_text:
Buy Photo Snowy weather in Shively. Jan. 10, 2015 (Photo: Sam Upshaw Jr.; The C-J)Buy Photo

Hazardous roads were expected to delay delivery of The Courier-Journal Monday, especially in outlying areas.

We appreciate your patience and consideration for the safety of your newspaper carrier.

In addition to the latest news at courier-journal.com, subscribers can read an electronic version of the newspaper.

Download The Courier-Journal newspaper edition app for iPhone and iPad and Android devices.

Read or Share this story: http://cjky.it/1P12ILG
